name: Junk Snail
description:
TOUGH AS SNAILS

- 2D physics based platforming snail adventure

- Narrated Story

- Create your own path!

CONTROLS: 

- SNAIL SLIDE = Left / Right arrow key

- SNAIL CLIMB = Quickly alternate L / R arrow keys on certain surfaces & walls

- SNAIL JUMP = Spacebar 

Available for Windows & Mac downloads

1.0 Build
